    • Highlights

      • Explore Agra’s most iconic landmarks, including the Taj Mahal, a UNESCO World Heritage site and one of the Seven Wonders of the World.
      • Visit Agra Fort, a majestic Mughal fort showcasing stunning architecture and history.
      • Excursion to Fatehpur Sikri, a former Mughal capital and a blend of Indo-Islamic architecture.
      • See Akbar’s Tomb in Sikandra, an architectural masterpiece and important Mughal site.
      • Discover Keetham Lake’s natural beauty and visit Wildlife SOS, a sanctuary for rescued elephants and bears.
      • Explore Agra’s bustling local markets, such as Sadar Bazaar, famous for handicrafts, marble items, and souvenirs.
      • Enjoy a mix of cultural heritage, historical exploration, and nature on this in-depth Agra tour.

    Amazing Agra Tour - 6 Nights / 7 Days

    Day 1: Arrival in Agra

    • Arrive in Agra and check into the hotel.
    • Evening visit to the famous Mehtab Bagh for a sunset view of the Taj Mahal across the Yamuna River.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Agra.

    Day 2: Taj Mahal and Agra Fort

    • Early morning visit to the Taj Mahal to witness the sunrise.
    • Explore Agra Fort, a UNESCO World Heritage site showcasing Mughal architecture.
    • Evening leisure time for shopping in Agra’s local markets.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Agra.

    Day 3: Fatehpur Sikri and Local Exploration

    • Day trip to Fatehpur Sikri, a historic city known for Buland Darwaza and other Mughal structures.
    • Return to Agra and relax or explore local eateries for dinner.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Agra.

    Day 4: Visit to Akbar’s Tomb and Sikandra

    • Morning visit to Akbar’s Tomb in Sikandra, an architectural marvel and important historical site.
    • Explore Dayal Bagh Temple, a unique temple known for its intricate carvings.
    • Leisure time in the evening to explore Agra’s cuisine and local culture.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Agra.

    Day 5: Excursion to Keetham Lake and Wildlife SOS

    • Morning visit to Keetham Lake, a serene spot for nature enthusiasts and photographers.
    • Explore Wildlife SOS, a rescue and rehabilitation center for elephants and bears.
    • Return to Agra for overnight stay.

    Day 6: Shopping and Local Market Exploration

    • Day reserved for exploring Agra’s famous markets like Sadar Bazaar and Kinari Bazaar.
    • Opportunity to purchase handicrafts, marble items, and other souvenirs.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Agra.

    Day 7: Departure from Agra

    • After breakfast, check out from the hotel and transfer to the airport or railway station for departure.
    • End of the Amazing Agra Tour.
